pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extract Matching Lines from Matching Files // Provides a simple interface to recursively list files from a directory, filter them using a regular expression, read their contents, and extract lines that match a user-defined pattern. The package returns a dataframe containing the matched lines, their line numbers, file paths, and the corresponding matched substrings. Designed for quick code base exploration, log inspection, or any use case involving pattern-based file and line filtering.
